imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square app icon with a clean, modern cab/travel mark and warm earthy palette (pwa-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
- Square app icon with a clean, modern cab/travel mark and warm earthy palette (pwa-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
- Maskable square app icon variant with generous safe area and warm earthy palette (pwa-maskable-512.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Add Progressive Web App (PWA) support so the existing AASRA cab web app can be installed and used like an Android app (Add to Home Screen), including a web app manifest, required Android icon sizes, and appropriate HTML meta tags.

Ensure the installed PWA experience works well on Android by verifying key screens are responsive and touch-friendly (header navigation, booking flow, contact options, and tracking screens) and that content is not clipped on small viewports.
Add the generated PWA icon assets into the project as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the PWA manifest.
